pr_title: iOS - Title update for change and temporary password.

timeline.message: Update title for change and temp password flow.
Fix change password typo in plist.
Fix change password typo in plist.

timeline.bodyText: why are these in all uppercase?
timeline.author: zohrehj
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -138,8 +138,8 @@ let kMessageNewPasswordBlank = "Please enter your new password."
 let kMessageValidateChangePassword = "New password and old password are same."
 
 // MARK: - ChangePassword Constants
-let kChangePasswordTitleText = "Change Password"
-let kCreatePasswordTitleText = "Create Password"
+let kChangePasswordTitleText = "CHANGE PASSWORD"
+let kCreatePasswordTitleText = "SET UP PASSWORD"

replies.bodyText: This change was requested by BA team.
replies.author: tushar-boston
